column4: I've stated my issue at http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=2062709 regarding the HDMI audio recombining and resyncing issue.
If anyone has experience with HDMI audio issues causing re-sync
or even if you remember hearing something once...

I don't use "sounds" on my pc but I do loop the hdmi audio back from the tv to the audio receiver digital input , however i haven't encountered any sync issues ...probly doesn't answer your question tho
